追逐向，我当时买的豪华版，现在依旧喜欢这一款，角色刻画及背景描写都很不错

Pros: 
+ VERY fun with friends. 
+ Amazing original survivors and killers as well as guest characters from iconic scary movie/TV franchises such as Leatherface, Freddy Krueger & Quentin Smith, Micheal Myers & Laurie Strode, Demogorgon, Steve Harrington & Nancy Wheeler from Stranger Things, and a few more. 
+ 3 unique perks for each survivor and killer, up to 4 perks equipped at a time allowing for interesting mix and match to assist you in game. Suviors 
+ Contrary to popular belief, this game DOES have depth on both sides. Learning to play "tiles", learning the maps and utilizing pallets and windows are key. 
+ Dedicated Servers. This might not be a plus for everyone, but it makes it a little bit more fair for both sides.
+ Seems to be good support for the game currently, new gameplay content introduced every 3 months or so. 

Cons:
- Solo queue. While you can queue up to play by yourself, it is highly not recommended WHEN LEARNING. After you learn the game at its nuances, solo queue can bit a little more bearable. 
- Very easy to rank up, feels meaningless to get to the highest rank. 
- "Camping" killers may ruin your experience as a beginner, Not really a resolution for this currently. 
- Bugs. Bugs in this game often goes a long time without being fixed if ever. A lot of miscellaneous things may not work as intended. This is often the case. 

Neutral: 
= New introduced "season pass". Think Fortnite battle pass as it comes with cosmetics for your characters and in game currency. 
= Game balance. Certain "add ons" and "offerings" may sway the game in one's favor. Killer sided vs an unorganized team. 
= Queue times. Varies depending on location and rank (and possibly party size, not sure) but usually very high and very low rank queue times are long.

Tl;DR: It's iight with friends.

Это просто лучшая игра всех лет. Столько способностей, столько умений, столько адреналина! ОЧЕНЬ советую поиграть, не пожалейте своих денег для этой супер-крутой игры. В игре есть 4 выживших и 1 убийца. Задача выживших-починить 5 генераторов для активации двери и сбежать через эту дверь. Задача убийцы-повесить всех выживших на крюк, тем самым принеся их в жертву Сущности. Главное-играть коллективно. Выжившие могут помогать друг другу, снимать с крюка, лечить, вместе чинить генераторы. А убийцу вы уже полностью рассмотрите, если последуйте моему совету: купите эту игру. И помните: когда вы играйте за выжившего, главное заставить убийцу ГОРЕТЬ и БОМБИТЬ

作为非对称竞技游戏的鼻祖之一，杀机确实做得不错，虽是小公司而为但可以满足不同的玩家的不同需求。比如追求竞技的玩家，游戏中设有段位机制；或者是情怀向玩家，各大DLC中的来自经典恐怖电影的杀手们可以满足你的愿望；还是追求快乐的玩家，游戏中设有自由度较高的自定义。总的来说，可玩性很强。唯一的缺点就是玩家人数偏少，匹配慢，同时常见bug的修复也有欠缺，希望改进

This is my favorite game on Steam! There are soooo many different things that make this game awesome, but the best thing by far is the concept. It is so exciting trying to escape by repairing generators, getting people of hooks, evading the killer, and working together. The killer's side is also very exciting, but I mostly play as survivor because I am a really good survivor, but I plan to get good at killer as well!
The game is okay but has some serious issues. Hopefully they get it worked out soon.
